document_title: Postpartum hemorrhoids: Causes, signs, treatment and prevention
subsection_content:
Postpartum hemorrhoids can be prevented with reasonable living habits from the beginning of pregnancy. These habits include:
In daily life: Exercise regularly with gentle exercises such as walking, yoga, etc. Patients should lie down and rest when tired. Do not sit or stand for too long as it will increase pressure on the pelvic area.; In daily life: Exercise regularly with gentle exercises such as walking, yoga, etc. Patients should lie down and rest when tired. Do not sit or stand for too long as it will increase pressure on the pelvic area.
Hygiene: Keep the private area clean to limit the risk of foreign bacteria entering; Go to the toilet when needed to regulate digestive function.
